metadata.title: CVE-2020-26417 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Information disclosure via GraphQL in GitLab CE/EE 13.1 and later exposesprivate group and project membership. This affects versions >=13.6 to<13.6.2, >=13.5 to <13.5.5, and >=13.1 to <13.4.7.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
